Runtime API Examples

On this page

Essential ​

NameIncompatibilitiesDescriptionClient / ServerNotes
Better Fps - Render DistanceAsync, Very Many PlayersBetter FPS Render Distance is a mod which adds a few performance improvements to increase fps.ClientIncompatible with Async, as Async is incompatible with this mod's dependancy (Cupboard).
Cull Particles MultiLoaderUnknownMultiLoader particle culling mod to improve performanceClientFork of a mod of a similar name
Entity CullingUnknownUsing async path-tracing to hide Block-/Entities that are not visibleClientN/A
FerriteCoreUnknownMemory usage optimizationsBothN/A
ImmediatelyFastUnknownSpeed up immediate mode rendering in MinecraftClientEffect is most noticable on CPU bottleneck and old CPU setups, according to the author
LithiumUnknownNo-compromises game logic optimization mod.BothN/A
ModernfixNoneAll-in-one mod that improves performance, reduces memory usage, and fixes many bugs.Both1.21.5+ builds can be obtained from Simply Optimized.
MoonriseC2ME, ScalableLux, AsyncOptimisation mod for the dedicated/integrated server.ServerPorts some of PaperMC's server patches. Also works on Singleplayer / LAN servers if the host has the mod. My testing with this mod has been pretty spotty before, YMMV.
Nvidium [^1]VulkanMod, Non-Sodium rendering enginesFast nvidia only rendering engine for sodiumClientFor GTX 16XX and RTX cards only. If the game crashes more often mid-game, remove this mod.
Particle CoreUnknownParticle culling, rendering optimizations, configurable particle-type-specific spawn reduction, and potion particle disabling.ClientN/A
SodiumVulkanModThe fastest rendering optimization mod for Minecraft.ClientN/A

Situational ​

NameIncompatibilitiesDescriptionClient / ServerNotes
AsyncMoonrise, CupboardAsync is a Fabric mod designed to improve the performance of entities by processing them in parallel threads.ServerBased on MCMTFabric / JMT-MCMT.
AsyncParticlesOptiFineAsync particle tick/renderingClientDisables some of Particle Core's optimizations when installed.
BetterBedsNoneChanges the renderer of the bed to use json models instead of a block entity renderer!ClientIncompatible with Bedspreads.
Concurrent Chunk Management EngineViaFabricPlus, MoonriseImprove the chunk performance of MinecraftBothEssential if not using VFP. VFP developer often advises users to remove C2ME to fix bugs.
Cull LeavesNoneAdds culling to leaf blocks, providing a huge performance boost over vanilla.ClientN/A
DebugifyUnknownFixes Minecraft bugs found on the bug trackerBothThis is mainly a bugfix mod, but some mods such as ForgetMeChunk and Entity Collision FPS Fix are included in this mod, so it counts.
Dynamic FPSUnknownReduce resource usage while Minecraft is in the backgroundClientAlso applies to battery mode and idle mode. Overrides Vanilla's "AFK Mode" setting.
GPU TapeVideo TapeFix VRAM leaks. Based on VideoTape.ClientVulkan compatible fork of Video Tape available on more setups (older versions, Forge setups)
MoreCullingUnknownA mod that changes how multiple types of culling are handled in order to improve performanceClientN/A
NoisiumPerformantOptimises worldgen performance for a better gameplay experience.ServerAlso works on Singleplayer / LAN servers if the host has the mod
PalladiumUnknownAnother optimizing mod, provides deduplication, improved memory control, shader/chunk/nbt optimizations and enchanced mob AI.ClientModrinth exclusive.
ScalableLuxMoonriseA Fabric mod based on Starlight that improves the performance of light updates in Minecraft.BothMight not be as efficient as Starlight, as 1.20+ has most of Starlight's enhancements already added.
ServerCoreUnknownA mod that aims to optimize the minecraft serverServerAlso works on Singleplayer / LAN servers if the host has the mod

Edge case ​

NameIncompatibilitiesDescriptionClient / ServerNotes
BadOptimizationsUnknownOptimization mod that focuses on things other than renderingClientN/A
KryptonUnknownA mod to optimize the Minecraft networking stackBothN/A
Language ReloadUnknownReduces load times and adds fallbacks for languagesClientN/A
Sodium ExtrasstfuAn add-on mod for Sodium that adds new features and customization.ClientHas very, very small optimizations. Causes issues with stfu.
SubstrateUnknownSodium add-on for optimization of the bottom (or top) layer of the worldClientFork of Bedrodium that culls more than just bedrock.
Super Fast MathOptiFineA lightweight fabric mod that changes the sin and cos for better math.ClientSimilar to OptiFine's "Fast Math" option.
ThreadTweakUnknownImprove and tweak Minecraft thread schedulingClientFork of Smooth Boot
ThreatenGLUnknownThreatens Minecraft to use modern versions of OpenGLClientJust changes the OpenGL version from 3.2 to 4.6 (or 4.1 on Mac). YMMV. Require a card from 2012 or later.
TT20UnknownTT20 helps reduce lag by optimizing how ticks work when the server's TPS is low.ServerDoesn't work properly on Singleplayer. Seemingly meant for servers whose TPS might go low every once and a while.

Possible Snake Oil ​

NameIncompatibilitiesDescriptionClient / ServerNotes
Reflex AntiLagUnknownImplementing Nvidia reflex in Minecraft to reduce latencyBothRequires a GTX 9XX or later. Very lightly tested, with no benchmarks. Use with caution.
RenderScaleIris + Distant Horizions [^2]Allows you to change Minecraft's render resolution separately from the HUD elementsClientMay cause lower performance, I haven't tested. Will definitely make your game look bad. Fork of ResolutionControl++.

[^1]: Original repo only goes up to 1.21.1 but you can get 1.21.2+ if you use drouarb's fork.

[^2]: Using Iris and Distant Horizions at once seems to cause issues with RenderScale. See this thread for potential fixes.
